titleStmt.title: A second letter to Hilton, the grand informer against religious meetings wherein his threatnings against constables are demonstrated to be vain : and the whole duty of those officers, in reference to that business, stated.
titleStmt.author: Philoeusebias Misonebulonides.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Lee and are to be sold by most booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and name of publisher from colophon; date of publication from p. [2].
Dated and signed: Aug. 28. 1682. From your Old Acquaintance, Philoeusebias Misonebulonides (p. [2]).
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
